title: Homemade Hummus
nutrition_tip: This classic garbanzo bean dip is easy to make and a versatile dish. Serve hummu…

ingredients.name: chickpeas (also known as garbanzo beans, cooked)
tahini (sesame paste, substitute peanut butter for a sweet taste)

steps.text: Mash the garbanzo beans until smooth (if you have a blender, put the beans and lemon juice into it and blend).
Add the garlic, lemon juice, tahini and oil. Mix well.
